content.rendered: This particular bottling from the popular Suntory Owner’s Cask range was distilled in 1992 and bottled at cask strength 15 years later. It’s a highly collectible whisky that holds outstanding liquid.

excerpt.rendered:
Distillery: Suntory
Distilled: 1992
Bottled: 2007
Whisky Origin: Japanese
Single Malt: Yes
Alcohol Strength: 61%
Bottle Size: 70cl
Weight: 2.5 Kg
